ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_1: Software Developer with over 3 years of experience in high-impact projects and data analysis.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_2: Specialized in data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL), performance optimization, and application security assurance.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_3: Expert in collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and implementing cutting-edge technologies to efficiently and effectively solve complex problems.

EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: As part of the team, I was responsible for extracting and transforming data from Excel to store it in AWS S3, ensuring its integrity and security. I supervised the process, documented the code, and worked on data visualization to make it understandable and appealing. Additionally, I collaborated with my colleagues to meet business objectives, providing training and support to new employees in complex tasks. I utilized my experience in Java and AngularJS to optimize performance and obtain data from Restful APIs.

I was responsible for the analysis, design, and development of software using .Net Framework and ReactJS. I implemented security standards, led projects, and managed clients to ensure quality. I also handled documentation, database normalization, data transformation, and user training. I focused on selecting optimal technologies and managed roles in administrative systems.

I led projects and development teams from analysis to implementation. I used cloud services like Firebase and AWS S3 Bucket, along with the MERN stack. I optimized multimedia file handling and managed errors on Github. I ensured software security and functionality with quality assurance tests. I implemented an accounting module and provided user training. I established CI/CD pipelines and documented processes.

I provided comprehensive technical support for computer and mobile equipment, effectively resolving issues and ensuring customer satisfaction. I handled inquiries, complaints, and requests in a professional and friendly manner, resulting in high levels of satisfaction. Additionally, I managed financial transactions accurately as a cashier and demonstrated effective communication skills, building strong relationships and fostering trust in the brand.

HACIENDA.TITLE: Hacienda el Orosi
HACIENDA.DESCRIPTION: An internal project was developed for a livestock company, encompassing comprehensive management of payments, employees, loans, tools, animals, billing, and sales. Utilizing technologies such as React, TailwindCSS, Express.JS, and MongoDB, an efficient and scalable platform was created, simplifying daily operations and empowering strategic decision-making.

SPOTIFY.TITLE: Open Spotify
SPOTIFY.DESCRIPTION: The creation of a React clone project was undertaken with the main goal of deepening understanding and mastery of the Next.js framework, in combination with the capabilities of React and the versatility of Tailwind CSS. This initiative not only allowed for exploration of the features and capabilities of these cutting-edge technologies, but also facilitated a better understanding of their interactions and how they can be leveraged in the development of modern and efficient web applications.

UNAVACUNA.TITLE: Una Vacuna
UNAVACUNA.DESCRIPTION: Development of a university project in Next.js as part of the Global Applications 2021 course. The emphasis was placed on implementing graphics, a robust login system, and an eye-catching, adaptable design for data management. The project was built using technologies such as Tailwind CSS, React, and Next.js.

GUANAMUEBLES.TITLE: Guana Muebles
GUANAMUEBLES.DESCRIPTION: During a university project, an E-commerce platform was designed for a company in need of an online sales platform. To showcase the project to the public, a comprehensive demonstration was conducted. The development involved creating a robust backend using Laravel, while the frontend was built with Angular. Bootstrap was chosen to ensure visually appealing and highly functional design.
